NPCs.Name: Attendant
NPCs.Description: The parking lot attendant looks old and grumpy, with a scowl on his face.
Dialogue: I've been working in this garage for 40 years. Seen it all.
People these days, always in a hurry. No patience.
You know, this place used to be different. Peaceful.
Now it's all cars, noise, and nonsense.
If you're here to park, just take a ticket and move along.

NPCs.Name: Creepy Man
NPCs.Description: John is a creepy character you encounter in the parking lot.
Dialogue: I'm looking for my car. Can you give me directions?
You're welcome. Have a safe trip!
